news.title: Heathrow Airport's expansion plans to cost £49bn
news.summary: Heathrow says expansion is "urgent" for UK growth, but plans are heavily criticised over environmental concerns.

news.title: Rats, mould and dangerous overcrowding - inside illegal house-shares hiding in plain sight
news.summary: Black-market rental properties are being openly advertised with unsafe conditions, BBC finds.

news.title: Two girls shot in Gaza - BBC pieces together what happened and looks at dozens more child shootings
news.summary: Layan and Mira were killed in proximity to IDF soldiers - the Israeli military says intentional harm to civilians is prohibited and their cases will be examined by the authorities.

news.title: University tuition fees in England and Wales rise to £9,535
news.summary: Maintenance loans have also gone up, meaning students can borrow more to help with living costs.

news.title: White House unveils plans for new $200m ballroom
news.summary: Donald Trump has been calling for the White House to build a new ballroom for nearly a decade.

news.title: Kyiv toll rises to 26 after wave of Russian strikes defies Trump ceasefire demand
news.summary: A boy and his mother are among the dead and Kyiv says it has seen the biggest number of children hurt in one night since start of war.

news.title: Lindsay Lohan on motherhood, acting again and the Freaky Friday sequel
news.summary: Lohan reunites with Jamie Lee Curtis for a sequel to the body-swap comedy that explores mother-daughter relationships.

news.title: The teenage caffeine pouch trend troubling US experts
news.summary: Some social media influencers are pushing products to young gym-goers and students, health experts warn.

news.title: The Papers:  'How Israel caused a famine' and 'Poisoned at summer camp'
news.summary: The crisis in Gaza and a suspected poisoning at a UK summer camp dominate Friday's papers.

news.title: Older driver rules 'could have saved mum's life'
news.summary: Claire Eady is calling for new regulations after losing her elderly mother in a crash.
